tool_description:
Translate, detect language, and text-to-speech capabilities for seamless multilingual communication.
This API is a lightweight version and can be used by simple translation applications
For more features check out this API-> https://rapidapi.com/biihezron1-5ghxDw6eSBV/api/linguatoolbox
name: Google Translate Text
title: Google Translate Text

api_list.name: translateText
api_list.description: Enter the text to be translated.

required_parameters.name: toLanguage
required_parameters.description: Enter the language you want to translate the text to. (Use the language codes in About/Read Me)

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Enter the text to be translated

optional_parameters.name: fromLanguage
optional_parameters.description: Enter the original language of text. (Use the language codes in About/Read Me)

api_list.name: textToSpeech
api_list.description:
convert a given text into speech. Note the audio file is available for 5 minutes maximum at our servers. Download as soon as possible

We are fixing some few bugs in this endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-translate-text.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-translate-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: supportedLanguages
api_list.description: Get a list of supported languages

url = "https://google-translate-text.p.rapidapi.com/supportedLanguages"
